courseSectionInformation: May be repeated to a maximum of 8 hours. Prerequisite: MUS 528A (consult Class Schedule for specific section information), or graduate standing in musicology, or consent of instructor.
description: Seminar in contemporary music, with emphasis on the historical foundations of current trends in musical composition. May be repeated to a maximum of 8 hours. Prerequisite: MUS 528A (consult Class Schedule for specific section information), or graduate standing in musicology, or consent of instructor.
label: Hist Studies in 20thC Music
sectionDeptRestriction: Restricted to students in the Music department.
